content.description:
Start with wide jugs. Sequence to the side pull

Second to third bolt is the crux and heady.

Starting two bolts are the variation start to the Amber Sample Offwidth.

A suggestion to bring a stick clip for the second bolt.
content.protection:
4 bolts to anchors.

Shares anchors with Amber Sample
content.location: Left bolt line on Crichton Crag.

content.description:
Match start on crimp ledge. Move into the wide-crack/offwidth then continue left up bolt line onto the face, continuing up and over the bulge.

Grade may flux depending on the use of that rear/right-of-crack formation. Crux is getting through the wide crack and onto the face.

Mind the chockstone(s).
content.protection:
4 bolts to anchors.

Shares anchors with Mosquito.
content.location:
Right most route on Crichton Crag.

The first formation when entering from Pipeline road and following the trail.
